tool_description: Extracts and structures educational background including degrees, institutions, dates, and academic achievements from resume text.

resume_text.description: The full text content of the resume

date_format.description: Expected date format (auto, mdy, dmy, ymd)

min_degree_level.description: Minimum degree level to extract (high_school, associates, bachelors, masters, doctoral)

error_messages: Empty resume text: Provide non-empty resume_text content for processing.
Invalid date format: Use one of [auto, mdy, dmy, ymd] for date_format parameter.
Invalid degree level: Use one of [high_school, associates, bachelors, masters, doctoral] for min_degree_level.
No education information found: The resume may not contain recognizable education section or formatting.
usage: Pass the resume_text and configure what types of education to extract. Set include_certifications and include_courses based on requirements, and specify date_format if dates follow a specific pattern.

degrees.description: List of degrees with degree type, major, institution, and dates

graduation_years.description: Years of graduation for each degree
